Package adrenaline.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClosedLobbyException
    This exception is thrown when a client tries to access a lobby that is closed.
    GameStartedException
    This exception is thrown when a client tries to access a lobby in which the game has already started.
    IllegalTargetException
    This exception is thrown when a player tries to hit other players that are not reachable with the weapon's effect.
    IllegalUseOfPowerUpException
    This exception is thrown when a player uses a power up effect in the wrong way.
    MustDiscardWeaponException
    This exception is thrown when a player exceeds the maximum number of weapons they can hold.
    NotEnoughAmmoException
    This exception is thrown when a player tries to perform an action that requires ammo but they don't have enough to pay the cost.
